name: video-cutter
description: Win and darwin app for fast4video

scripts._copy-external-resources: mkdir .\release-builds\Fast4Videos-win32-ia32\resources\cache && xcopy .\cache .\release-builds\Fast4Videos-win32-ia32\resources\cache /e && mkdir .\release-builds\Fast4Videos-win32-ia32\resources\Frameworks && xcopy .\Frameworks .\release-builds\Fast4Videos-win32-ia32\resources\Frameworks && mkdir .\release-builds\Fast4Videos-win32-ia32\resources\windist && xcopy .\windist .\release-builds\Fast4Videos-win32-ia32\resources\windist /e
scripts.package-python-win: rmdir .\windist /s /q && pyinstaller pythonScripts/client.py && ren dist windist && echo. > windist/erase_windist_folder_by_the_dist_pyinstaller_folder.txt
scripts.compile-package-win-app: git checkout production_ready && npm run package-python-win && npm run package-win && npm run _copy-external-resources

author: Boulhol Timeo
